blogPost.title: “It’s not about helping Africa, or about helping low income countries...it’s about a common good.”@NOIweala speaks to @zannymb about how the @WTO can help facilitate vaccine supply on “The Economist Asks” podcast https://t.co/XpvlUFdHrY https://t.co/lZzlmDorJk
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: "The Economist Asks" ポッドキャスト https://t.co/XpvlUFdHrY https://t.co/lZzlmDorJk で、@NOIweala が @zannymb に、@WTO がワクチンの供給を促進するのに役立つ方法について語っています。
"这不是为了帮助非洲，也不是为了帮助低收入国家......而是为了共同的利益。"@NOIweala在 "The Economist Asks "播客中向@zannymb谈及@WTO如何帮助促进疫苗供应 https://t.co/XpvlUFdHrY https://t.co/lZzlmDorJk
"這不是爲了幫助非洲，也不是爲了幫助低收入國家......而是爲了共同的利益。"@NOIweala在 "The Economist Asks "播客中向@zannymb談及@WTO如何幫助促進疫苗供應 https://t.co/XpvlUFdHrY https://t.co/lZzlmDorJk

previous.title: Single-sport specialisation in schools may explain why more young people than ever before are sustaining ACL injuries https://t.co/fsQxSHdFxs

localize.full_text: 学校における単一スポーツの特化が、かつてないほど多くの若者がACL損傷を負う理由になっているかもしれない https://t.co/fsQxSHdFxs
学校中的单一运动专业可能解释了为什么比以往更多的年轻人遭受十字韧带损伤 https://t.co/fsQxSHdFxs
學校中的單一運動專業可能解釋了爲什麼比以往更多的年輕人遭受十字韌帶損傷 https://t.co/fsQxSHdFxs
